Ebbro 44887 Nissan Silvia Turbo (S15) 2002 JGTC Series GT300 Class 3rd Place M. Yanagida/T. Yamano

Purchased: 2014
Manufacturer page: http://www.ebbro.jp/SHOP/44887.html

Masataka Yanagida and Tetsuya Yamano raced for Hasemi Motorsports in the 2002 JGTC Series. Their best result was a win in round 3 at Sportsland SUGO and they finished 3rd overall in the GT300 class that year. Yanagido & Yamano separately went on to win multiple GT300 & GT500 titles in both JGTC & Super GT series.
